title: people ruining your ranked
body:
this is a discussion to complain so you dont complain on other boards, everyone say the worst things that have ruined your attempts to climb
ill start
adc didnt want me to go sion support so when i did he went ap draven
when i dont mid my mid feeds
when i dont support my adc feeds

due to some errors when i tried to post it said error so the poll isnt up, if you would like to contribute to a poll say your vote in the comments
Q. Is a discussion to gather all salt a good idea
1. Yes
2. No
3. Cant hear you, 2 busy flaming

replies.body: Dont worry i feel you. Im a support main so its almost impossible to climb as its one hard to carry secondly at least one person feeds their ass off and i have to get back to promo just so the same thing happens. But at least my 10 rank designateor decided to put me in the lowest possible place for doing well. 6 wins with at least a kda of 2. {{item:3070}}
i carried my premade quinn adc getting her to immense snowball and i get matched b3
